entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 30 January 2023
